data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_2928027062e3c2a97bc3fd4a84897012.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
If no damage is taken within 5s, Franco gains 10% Movement Speed, recovers 1% Max HP per second, and begins accumulating <font color="a6aafb">Wasteland Force</font> (up to 10 stacks).

Franco will consume all <font color="a6aafb">Wasteland Force</font> stacks on his next skill cast to increase the skill's damage by up to 150%.

Franco launches an iron hook in the target direction. The hook will snag the first enemy unit hit, dealing 400<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and dragging them to Franco.
Franco lashes out, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 300 plus 4% of his Max HP to nearby enemies and slowing them by 70% for 1.5s.

Franco suppresses the target enemy hero for 1.8s and strikes them 6 times over the duration, each time dealing 50<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

data.name: Franco

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Full Movement Speed to roam and gank across the map.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Encourage:
equiplist.equipskill2: Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill6: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Encourage: 
Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equiptips:
+65 Movement Speed
+35% Slow Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Crit Damage Reduction
+70 Extra Physical Defense

data.story: Brave permafrost warrior, Bane's sworn enemy.

assist.desc: Heroes with high burst damage such as Vale, Karina and Brody to take advantage of his CC.

strong.desc: Heroes with low mobility like Vale, Estes and Layla.

weak.desc: Heroes with high mobility or Control Immunity such as Wanwan, Fanny and Badang.
